text:
Kya haal Bende bro,

What an amazing summer we had. Summer-Camp was fun with you, so was playing volleyball and so was discussing football and life in general.  That Champions league final we went to watch in OAT and you were wearing your Real jersey,  was a very special experience. Unfortunately, things did not pan out as you would have planned and through that difficult phase, its actually commendable how to picked yourself up again. I know I may not have been best of the friends during that time, but I cared and when I look back on it, I think I should have done more and we should have spent some more time together. FIFA match to jarur khelenge ek din. Until then, good luck with everything and take care. You are a very humble person, stay that way and stay in touch.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal sir,
First year trip manali trip se malana cream partner. BC kya headers leta tha tu Bayern se bc full cross spamming FIFA and basketball in the last days was kaafi fun. Lucknow trip toh alag hi chapter hai poora. 'Chill maar' ko actual justice tu karta hai. Baaki, AVALON wali hookah night Maqbool ke paas toh yaad rahegi. 
Banate hai plan phir jald hi next trip ka. All the best and take care
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal 'bhai BT ho gyi',
Sath Bakchodi karte karte 4 saal nikal gye bhai. First year trip destination decide karne se baat shuru hui phir kabhi ruki hi nhi. BC kahan le gye the kebab khilane. Between "capacity badhani hai" and " bhai ek aur banao" you grew up. Tumhari bakchodi ke charche toh hai hi campus mai. Lucknow trips ke dhanyavad. Yadu ko gariyane ke liye dhanyavad. Exist karne ke liye dhanyavad. Second year summers ka time bhi behatreen tha. Aur wo Akhiri party ka toh koi jawab hi nhi hai. Ek aur saal hai, Good luck and take care.

Agle mahine Spiti onn hai!
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Rocky,
Saale first year mai tere maghne ke kisse the campus mai. Bhai wo 3rd year galaxy ka video shoot toh kya hi tha, thanks for being a loyal right hand and phir campus mai aakhiri wali bakchodi. Vaise toh aakhiri shaaam campus mai  kaafi acchi thi but ek grand mehfil apan dono waali pending hai. kaafi caring hai bhai tu. And ye bhi fact hai tune carry kiya hai Mohit aur Aviral ko.  
Never thought a guy like you would go in fests, but guess but you became head and kaafi chaapa bhi
Bhai, I know you ll be a very big name in physics one day for sure. All the very best with everything.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kyaa haal dank friend,

ART105 was the beginning and what a fun time it was! Kuch bhi shot karne lag jaate the. Reunion Mocha outing bhi sahi this, kya pel ke khaya tha apan ne. Thank you for the daily dose for dank content and for a being support who I can always count on. We did not spent much time together, but whenever we did it was a reminder that we need to do this more often. Baaki treks ka silsila toh barkarar rahega, hopefully there sath bhi. Bangalore wali party toh onn hai hi. Last hangout was special too aur bc agle din tu positive aa gyi thi. Good luck with everything and  stay a crazy ass that you are.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal bhai,
Not a single day of campus life can be summarised without you. Probably one of those very few guys who would know 'almost' all of my secrets. Day 1 se lekar 'aakhiri shaam' in the campus we have grown immensely together. There couldn't have been a better closure.  Those random long talks in the midnight, playing MM and PUBG were awesome indeed. Kabhi nahi Socha tha ki I'll go along so well with someone jiske aur mere interests itne different honge. My go to ranting partner. Thank you being constant support throughout. BC exam ke pehle hi saari TVs kyon dekhni hoti thi tujhe. 
BC kabhi kabhi dusro ki baat bhi maan jaaya kar, toh tu bhi ek aur bakchod trip ka part hota!
UPSC ke liye all the best and I'd hope ki IIMA ki jarurat na pade. 
take care,
your roomie
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya saale,
Chale OAT rooftop. Bhai, kya time tha wo last ka. Saale FIFA mai kitna ganda haarta tha bhai tu. But koi na abhi time hai tere paas practice kar lena. Holi was special, so was our every hangout. Saale Cab mai bhi phunkwa diya tune. Aur phir beer aur le li thi. Sahi tha wo safar bhi. Agra aa rha hu jaldi hi, banate hai scene.
I haven't come across a naturally funnier person than you on campus. Mama Mio was our routine. Bhai kya juicy crosses daalta tha tu box mai, a dream for CF. Milte hai Valo mai phir.
Good luck and take care
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Ki haal veere,

First year, Orientation ton hi naal si appa. Fer Inferno freshers treat te bicycling trip kaafi kaint experience si. Yaar, first year ch appa mast boliyan prepare kittiyan si. Mast mahol banaya si utthe, bhangra vi paya si. Final sem ch naal bathera football khedeya si. Veere, inna changa banda kyon aa tu, ajj kal khat ee milde teri breed de. Balle, football te jama ai siraa khed da sii tu. Chal, changa fer, milde aa fer kade. WMK
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Nepali,

Bhai, Kota se shuru hua tha apna behatreen safar. Classes bunk karke mast cricket khelne jaate the IL ground mai. Sath mai InterIIT volleyball khelne ka sapna adhoora reh gya. Bsdk funde kam diya kar aur kabhi baap ki baat bhi sun liya kar. Intern and placement ki BT toh mil-julkar hi handle ki hai. Bhai, best toh wo tha jab mai aur tu ek ghante tak Ishu ko volleyball khelta dekhkar hasse the. Saale first year trip pe dhokha de gya tha, but karte hai next trip ka prabandh jald hi.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal KG,

Bhai, hamesha mazak karta tha mai tere sath, agar kabhi bura laga ho toh grow up man. Baaki kaafi chill banda hai bey tu, and good that you opened up gradually. You always had a positive vibe. Baaki sun ne mai aya last sem mai dealer ban gya tha tu and logon ki virginity tudwa rha tha. 
Chal, good luck for next year and beyond, and take care.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal DR1,

Bhai, first of all, thanks for increasing the average cpi of our department and being only nehli in eco after first sem, so respect for that and all the academic achievements you had during your course. Its fortunate that we came across and sometimes I am envious of your way of doing things and would love to catch some of that. Baaki it was great to see you on the badminton court and I wish we had played more. Thanks for that HSO endsem night for last hour tutorial. Best of luck with everything you re planning for, I am hopeful that you ll be through it. Stay connected and see ya sometime.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal mote,
Bhai, tu toh mera partner in crime tha 4 saal. Kitne kisse hai, but wo techkriti wala toh wakayi mai bhai hats off tere confidence ko. Hamara bargaining leader tha tu. Mukteshwar trip was indeed special and memorable. Antiquity is our go to buddy. Agra mai welcome karne ko thanks and for that heaviest breakfast I've had in life. I wish you all the good luck for next year and don't worry you'll get placed someplace very good. Milte hai jald, agra aa rha hu.
Take care
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Maqbool,

Dram-eve 1 se shuru hua tha bhai apna safar, uske baad final year tak toh alag hi unchaiyan choo gya tha. Sabse pehle toh online sems nikalwane ke liye dhanyavad. Bhai lucknow mai toh kya hi scene kiya tha apan ne, infact poora lucknow trip hi bakchod tha and uske baad campus mai toh un raaton ko kya hi bayan karein. 
Baaki toh, volleyball sath khelna kaafi sahi tha and kaafi acchha khelta hai tu  aur full efforts daalta hai. One of those few people on campus who have their priorities straight about how they want to carry themselves. I know for a fact you re going to go places for many reasons. 
Good luck and take care, see you soon sometime
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Palak,

Abey ye bta, tujhe har jagah kyon kaam karna hai. Bc itna enthu kahan se laati hai. Manali trip toh kya hi thi, aur sorry tere aur Ritika ka gyan na sun ne ke liye. Second year mai frehsers kaise hi karwayi thi apan ne. Department waala time bhi kaafi bearable ho gye teri vajah se.Thanks for the constant support, thoughout. Unexpected friend is one thing of the past, Usse revive karte hai, trip plan karte kabhi agar ho paaya toh. Baaki good luck with everything.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Laambe,

Volleyball ka ek bhi pratice session ya match aisa nhi tha jab tu sath nhi tha. Bhai, apna dynamic kuch alag hi tha shuru see hi alag level pe connect ho gye the. Inter-IIT mai kaafi sahi memories thi but kaafi regret rahega ki itni bakchod team ke baad bhi medal nhi aaya, Kaafi depressing time tha wo bhi and jab hamara game peak pe aaya toh Inter--IIT cancel ho gya. 
Bhai maine terese jyada excited londa nhi dekha kisi bhi cheez ke liye. Bhai wo Bhubaneshwar mai Random ladkiyon ko roses dena was epic. Shayad usi din tera female interaction peak kiya hoga college life mai. Volleyball journey ke rough phase mai believe karne ke liye thanks bhai. Milte hai phir kabhi jaldi, Mithai ka dabba lekar aunga tere liye.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Roomie,
Bhai first year mai kaafi bakchodiyan ki hai but wo Bithoor wali cycle trip toh kaafi impulsive and bakchod thi and uske baad Blue world wala din! You should be a template for a roommate. Bhai aise hi muskurata reh. Dhyan rakh apna,  all the best and good times ahead.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal bey,
Bhai, knew from day 1 our bond is going to be a special one. Going to that marathon in 1st year was just beginning of how we would go about our plans. Baaki cliche wala toh kya hi likhu but kaafi genuine Banda hai bey tu. Playing FIFA,MM, PUBG together has been fun. Antaragni’17 was memorable and so was our last summit together. Kaafi chill kiya last dance wale phase mai, Baddy, Squash, gym, football, basketball partner. That OAT night was special so was the last night in the campus. Kuch yaad hai? 
Saale thoda chill maara kar itna aggressive mat hua kar sports mai. AVALON mai jab tu hamesha Evil hi lagta hai. 
I have so much respect for you bhai, the way you carry yourself and take care of people around you. Thanks for pushing me for the gym. Milte hai super soon, Himachal is waiting for us.
Good luck with everything and take care
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text: Behenchod joote ki photo toh hatade..!!
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Pandit!
Dil toh baccha hai ji type londa, Har choti choti cheezon mai khushiyan dhoondhne wala londa, Maggu but galaxy feel wala londa and mere 4 semester nikalwane wala londa. Bhai tu nhi hota toh pta nhi kya hota mere 3rd year ka. Mazaaa aata tha exams se pehle night out maarke padhne mai tere sath padhne mai, phir uske baad wo TT marathons.
Tere aur Dayal ke room pe hi rehte the adhe time to hum dono. Our DumbC team was invincible. Saale tu acting ki vajah se hi team tha bas, guess toh tu ek dum jh**t barabar karta tha. 

Bhai kaafi dedicated hai tu and You deserve much more and hopefully you’ll get soon enough. All the best for the final year and beyond. Saale Dhyan rakhiyo and ek phone call dur hi hun bas.

Aur han Andaman toh jaayenge bas time decide karna hai!
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal Arya,

First year mai cricket khele the sath mai, aur ab football ke through connected hai. You are true sports fanatic. Baaki we never hanged out much, but I would have loved too, maybe sometime in future cause why not, with a beer in hand watching a PL match seems like good idea to me. Bhai, supporting Arsenal is like a toxic relationship, low key I enjoy the everyday drama. Baaki, all the best in AmEx and take care,
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal bhai,

First year MM se volleyball camp mai sath the apan. Saale, kab nhi bani apni tu thoda difficult tha iska matlab ye thodi bani nhi. But kaafi emotional hai bey tu isliye bura nhi lagta tha tera. Summer camp kaafi sahi time tha. Teri kuch embarassing photos hai. Dikhaunga jab milenege kabhi. Tera aur Neha ka toh alag hi dynamic tha bc but in the end it worked thankfully. All the best for the amazing future and good luck.
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Kya haal ,
Apni yaari ki shururaat to Econs se ho gyi thi but Manali trip se toh takeoff kar gyi thi. Remember that journey and conversation back from Lucknow sitting on the stairs of UP Roadways. Jaipur mai mast katwaya tha bc tune mera. Playing basketball together was always fun. Last month mai toh adha time tere aur ISHU ke room hi rehta tha mai, sahi time tha wo bhi. 
But seriously man kaafi dedicated tha tu Antaragni ke liye. You were a man on a mission in college, sab kuch calculated tha kya kya and kab kab karna hai. Baaki, milte hai jald hi phir scene banate hai.
Good luck and take care
author: Jatin  Rathaur

text:
Yo nigg Kya haal,
Bhai, Kaise ho? Is there a better human being than you on earth? No, I don't think so. 
We had sort of a language exchange program, didn't we?  
Sorry for the countless pranks on you, you're Dwight to my Jim but your last prank was really good (trip wala).  Kitna FIFA khela hai bhai sath, those intense FIFA sessions were only time in college when my stress would peak xD. I would have to admit that you have influenced me to be a better person. You re a gem of a guy.

I have seen your transformation in college so closely, your Hindi skills, your eating time. Thanks for the coming on the trip and pushing yourselves. 
Good luck and cheers for our next phase
author: Jatin  Rathaur
